seriesJson.title: Detroit Symphony Orchestra
seriesJson.description: Detroit Symphony Orchestra concert series, recorded at the Ford Auditorium on the Detroit Riverfront.

node.title: Dvorak, Hindemith, Nielsen, and Sibelius, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, presents part of a concert that included performances of pieces by Dvorak, Hindemith, Nielsen, and Sibelius. The Detroit Symphony Orchestra is conducted by Sixten Ehrling.
